abstracts.cdata!:
The First Reconstruction Import Credit
            Project will make available US$40 million to help meet the
            priority import requirements of the Government of
            Ghana's economic recovery program. These funds will be
            allocated to the procurement of fertilizers, insecticides,
            agro-chemicals, agricultural implements, spares and tools,
            and truck tires, batteries, and spare parts in accordance
            with the Government's foreign exchange budget.
            Counterpart funds will be allocated to the recurrent or
            capital costs of priority projects included in the economic
            recovery program.
